> <OLD>
>
> Stuck by the fatal properties of Magmatron's blast, the Silver Dragon
> gathers what little strength left as he stumbles back up onto all fours.
> Down but not out, he steps over to Rodimus Prime, now seeing for himself
> that one of them was an evil clone.  He takes a deep breath.
>
> " One of you is real but one of you isn't .  The real Rodimus was given a
> gift by the old Silver Dragon who lived in the cave above the Ark.  Could
> you now show me that gift?  That is the real Rodimus Prime.
>
> He could barely move but he was determined to put the matter to rest.

<NEW>

"No!" DARK RODIMUS said as he looked at the burnt form of TUSCON and
then back at the newly revealed RODIMUS PRIME, "I am the Real RODIMUS
PRIME!"

DARK RODIMUS opened his chest plate and inside was a glowing object,
gleaming with black light and purple highlights. It pulsated in his
chest.

Then RODIMUS PRIME opened his, and inside was a similar structure, but
his gleamed with pure lights, yellows, blues and whites, it purity
against the blackness of the DARK RODIMUS.

> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight saw Both Rodimus and she felt anger, pain... She felt like a
> fool.

DARK RODIMUS looked at NIGHTLIGHT, fear, anger, loss and betrayal
warring across his face plate. "Nightlight!" He said to her, "Tell
this . . . this imposter that *I* am the *REAL* RODIMUS!"

RODIMUS PRIME looked at NIGHTLIGHT and then at DARK RODIMUS, "You have
hurt her!" He said. "You will pay!"

Both RORDIMUS' began to run at each other, the doors of thier chests
closing as they they prepare for battle!

Meanwhile the female figure that was with RODIMUS vanished from sight
and appeared next to TUSCON she was dark with blue and orange
highlights. "You are wounded." She said. "We need to get you out of
here."

Meanwhile all around them a battle was raging!

(TAG)

- Preston
